LabelingInterface.title: Multi-Timeseries ECG Classification
LabelingInterface.description: Classify each ECG time series as AF, Noise, or None. Then provide a global sample classification and any observations.

Help.title: ECG Classification Guide
Help.Resource: Welcome to the ECG Classification tool! This guide will help you understand how to classify ECG time series data. Please review each lead carefully and select the appropriate classification.

Resource.title: Video Tutorial (replace with your own link)

Help.Resource: - AF (Atrial Fibrillation): Look for irregular rhythm, absence of P waves, and variable R-R intervals. - Noise: Select this when the signal quality is poor or contains artifacts. - Non-AF: Normal sinus rhythm or other arrhythmias that are not AF.
